alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong lightning storms will impact portions of St. Lucie, northeastern Okeechobee, Indian River and northwestern Martin Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tradition, or 10 miles west of Port Saint Lucie, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and periods of heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Fort Pierce, Sebastian, Vero Beach, and Fellsmere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Okeechobee
